lyrics.line: Where laughter and joy always mingle
Here you can tell jokes and make 'em crack,
And write funny poems that'll keep you on track
You can also create audio poems for your kin,
And spread happiness with every grin
My site is a place where humor thrives,
And where the fun never subsides
So come on in and join the fun,
Let's laugh together, one by one
With Ringledingle, there's no need to be blue,
Just let loose and enjoy the view
Thank you for visiting my little corner of glee,
I hope it brings you as much joy as it brings me
So let's keep the laughter going strong,
With Ringledingle, life is never wrong
